Class LeaderMarble

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Card.Card

it.polimi.ingsw.model.Card.LeaderMarble
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class LeaderMarble
extends LeaderCard
This class is used to represents the Leader Card which has the white marble ability.
